Property.name: myText
Property.value: World in Conflict has detected that you have a wireless network device installed.

Property.name: myText
Property.value: To make it easy to connect to other wireless computers without a router, World in Conflict can create an ad-hoc network for peer-to-peer connections. All players will have to enable the ad-hoc network option before creating or joining a game for this to work correctly.

Property.name: myText
Property.value: Please note that while the ad-hoc network is enabled, any wireless internet connection will be disabled. Disabling the ad-hoc network or exiting the game will automatically restore the connection. Wired internet connections are not affected.

Property.name: myText
Property.value: WORLD IN CONFLICT: SOVIET ASSAULT DETECTED

Property.name: myText
Property.value: An installation of World in Conflict: Soviet Assault was detected, but you have an old campaign already active. To play the new Soviet missions, you must start a new campaign. We recommend that you do so now.

Property.name: myText
Property.value: Your old World in Conflict campaign will be saved and can be continued at a later time, but without the Soviet missions.
